Html:
I downloaded from the Source Code - compositewpf-52595.zip, which does not contains the Prism source code.

I need it, because my boss asked too. according to him, there's a clause in the licensing terms, that we should download the source code and compiled ourself, instead using the binary provided in the installer, this will free us from any legal issues (.... oh really?...)

Hi,

You can find the Prism v4 Source Code inside the file you mentioned, in the following location:

.\V4\PrismLibrary

I hope you find this useful.

﻿﻿Agustin Adami
